Why would you seed this as rar files? It adds nothing of value, i.e. it won't compress the video even one bit. 

And in addition to that, all the retards will scream bloody murder when they don't understand something like archive files, so please don't seed rar files again. Thanks for the upload though.

I agree, putting rar files inside a torrent is pointless. Rar fragments make sense when downloading multiple pieces, not inside a torrent which does all the fragmenting, error checking, and reconstructing for you.
